content.description: Climb the slab to the left of Everdrip encountering two bolts. Traverse left at second bolt and under roof. Exit around left end of roof at wide crack. Finishes at bolted rap station just above roof. The pine at the top of Everdrip just beyond the bolted rap station has a chain but is in rough shape with slightly lifted roots.
content.location: Located on dry slab just left of Everdrip.

content.description:
The Cataracts area is a wide, scruffy cliff band with a great selection of ice climbs that continues to climber's left from the rock crag known as The Rampart.  There is a great deal of easy ice climbing here, as well as some harder routes and variations, which makes it an excellent location for first timers. 

  Right Cataract is a large area of somewhat indistinct low angle flows, as well as a few steeper flows tucked up in the back corner. 

  Left Cataract has a good selection of moderate slabby climbs with many variations as well as some steeper climbs towards the far left, including "Everdrip" and "Neverdrip."
